item.title: Using Traefik 2 and Docker for local development with multiple projects
item.description: TL;DR Fine, just skip directly to the Github repo that has a complete example of how to do this: https://github.com/jimbojsb/docker-traefik-local-dev Background What is Traefik This seems more complicated than doing nothing… Step 1: Get a real domain name, and host it in public DNS Step 2: Make a new project / Git repo Step 3: Set up the basics of Traefik Step 4: Set up Let’s Encrypt for SSL Step 5: Connect an actual project to a subdomain Wrap Up
